channel.title: CVE Feed for wcmp -- MultiVendorX – MultiVendor Marketplace Solution For WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wcmp -- MultiVendorX – MultiVendor Marketplace Solution For WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2020-36741|2024-08-04T17:37:06.664Z -- wcmp -- multivendorx%20%E2%80%93%20multivendor%20marketplace%20solution%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The MultiVendorX plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 3.5.7. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the submit_comment() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to submit comments via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
